hero.title: Discover Vietnam's Avian Wonders with BirdLens
hero.subtitle: Your pocket guide to identifying birds, exploring nature hotspots, and connecting with fellow enthusiasts. Built by students, for students and nature lovers across Vietnam!

aboutSection.title: What is BirdLens?
aboutSection.paragraph: BirdLens Vietnam is a mobile application designed to help students, nature enthusiasts, and aspiring birdwatchers easily identify and learn about the diverse birdlife of Vietnam. Our mission is to foster a deeper appreciation for nature through technology, community engagement, and accessible educational content. We are starting lean, focusing on core features and growing with our user base, primarily engaging through university partnerships and our official Facebook page.
reasons: Get early access to the latest features and improvements.
Be part of our growing community from the very beginning.
Provide direct feedback to help shape the future of BirdLens.
It's free! We're distributing via APK to make it accessible to everyone.
